com.xtructure.xutil.valid
Interface ValidationStrategy<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of objects to validate
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractValidationStrategy, ArgumentValidationStrategy, StateValidationStrategy, TestValidationStrategy
public interface ValidationStrategy<T>

A strategy for validating objects using conditions and dealing with the success or failure of those conditions.

Version:
0.9.5
Author:
Luis Guimbarda, Peter Nürnberg

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DEFAULT_MSG
          default message string used when validating
 
Method Summary
 void processFailure(T object, java.lang.String msg, Condition condition)
          Process the failure of the given condition on the given object.

          Process the success of the given condition on the given object.
 boolean validate(T object)
          Validate the given object using the conditions in this ValidationStrategy.
 boolean validate(T object, java.lang.String objectName)
          Validate the given object using the conditions in this ValidationStrategy.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

validate

boolean validate(T object)
Validate the given object using the conditions in this ValidationStrategy.

Parameters:
object - the object to validate
Returns:
true if the given object is valid with respect to this ValidationStrategy, false otherwise

validate

boolean validate(T object,
                 java.lang.String objectName)
Validate the given object using the conditions in this ValidationStrategy.

Parameters:
object - the object to validate
objectName - the name of the object to validate
Returns:
true if the given object is valid with respect to this ValidationStrategy, false otherwise

processSuccess

void processSuccess(T object,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    Condition condition)
Process the success of the given condition on the given object.

Parameters:
object - the object that satisfied the condition
msg - a message
condition - the condition that was satisfied

processFailure

void processFailure(T object,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    Condition condition)
Process the failure of the given condition on the given object.

Parameters:
object - the object that did not satisfy the condition
msg - a message
condition - the condition that was not satisfied
